p: Anti-Parkinson activity was evaluated in SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cells, revealing a protective effect of sulfuretin against the cytotoxicity induced by MPP + (1-methyl-4-phenyl pyridinium) neurotoxin. The neuroprotective effects are due to the effects of sulfuretin on ERK and Akt/GSK3Î² pathways ( Pariyar et al., 2017).
